item.title: Home
item.content:
Rewind Rentals

Looking for something entertaining but not planning to use it for the long term?

Rewind Rentals is the place for you to rent them! We are a video rental franchise in Aus that provides a platform not only for us and for customers to list their home entertainment products for short term rentals under a wide range of categories, such as movies, games, speakers, consoles, screens, and more.

Featured Products

  1. My Love

    Tells the 15-year love story between Zhou Xiao Qi, a long-time swimming student and You Yong Ci, a transfer student. In high school, Zhou fell in love at first sight with You. A young and ignorant pure love, the boy silently guarded, but the girl left without saying goodbye. Life after that, 15 years of love long-distance race. Your wedding is also my coming-of-age gift.

  2. The Monkey King 3

    The Monkey King and his traveling companions must find a way to escape from the clutches of a queen who rules an all-female kingdom. They soon land in even deeper trouble when their shenanigans anger the mighty River God.

  3. Shining For One Thing

    Lin Bei Xing is a young woman, who is about to enter her 30s, suddenly finds that her life has gone awry when her fianc√©, Zhan Yu, whom she has been in love with since high school, cancels their engagement to date her best friend. Hoping to rekindle memories of their love, Lin invites Zhan to return to their high-school premise in their old school uniforms for a day. While waiting for Zhan Yu in the rain, she activates her old phone and unknowingly travels back in time.
item.author: sinhantwenty
